short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flanity lets you quickly switch between your browser tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wondered if you can ALT + TAB (or CMD + TAB for Mac) between your browser tabs? Do you usually have too many open tabs in your web browser or don't know how to effectively switch between them?

Flanity lets you quickly switch between your browser tabs. You can easily browse recent tabs and search each tab's title and domain.

Usage
========

Mac:

CMD + SHIFT

Windows and Linux:

ALT + SHIFT
